thread.title: Probes, Cyberattack Distract Atlanta as It Tries to Woo Amazon

author: Cameron McWhirter
title: Probes, Cyberattack Distract Atlanta as It Tries to Woo Amazon
text:
ATLANTAâ€”As this growing city looks to lure Amazon.com Inc. and other corporate giants to the region, its new mayor has found her efforts stymied by scandals from the outgoing administration and the aftereffects of a crippling cyberattack on city operations.
Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms, who took office in January, is dealing with various investigations related to her predecessor, Kasim Reed, including a federal corruption probe into several areas of city government and city investigations into a deluge of bonuses he paid staff...
